Rulings.Base:
1. You can Special Summon "Playful Possum" from the GY during ANY of your Standby Phases after it destroyed itself by its effect, not just the very next one.
2. Your opponent must control a face-up monster with a higher ATK than "Playful Possum" when its effect resolves in order for it to be destroyed. If they do not, "Playful Possum" is not destroyed.
3. If "Playful Possum" is not face-up when its effect resolves, it is not destroyed.
4. If "Playful Possum" is destroyed by its own effect then removed from play from the GY and then later returned by "Burial from a Different Dimension" it will not be Special Summoned.
